Name: Homeworld Defense
About the game: Homeword defense is a strategic game in which you will protect your new home planets from the constant waves of asteroids, find out why they appear and save your world from the threat once and for all. You will see 10 worlds, whose name denotes the ancient beliefs of the colonialists, who conquered these worlds. To protect the worlds You will need a variety of weapons. To discover the worlds and weapons, gather the dark matter that remains after the destruction of the asteroids. If You do not have enough dark matter to open a new weapon or world, You can always visit the world you have already visited. Collect dark matter and resources for weapons while protecting your worlds. Learn more about the aliens who attack your worlds. Protect your Homeworld!
